#         Windhorst R., Pirzkal N., Grogin N., Koekemoer A.M., Lisker T., 
#         Panagia N., Daddi E., Hathi N.P. 
#Table: Catalog of PEARS early-type galaxies: Observed data
#================================================================================
#Byte-by-byte Description of file: apj313884t1_mrt.txt
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   Bytes Format Units  Label  Explanations
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   1-  6 A6     ---    PID    PEARS identification number 
#   9- 19 F11.7  deg    RAdeg  Right Ascension in decimal degrees (J2000)
#  22- 31 F10.6  deg    DEdeg  Declination in decimal degrees (J2000)
#  34- 38 F5.2   mag    imag   The i-band (F775W) AB magnitude 
#  41- 45 F5.2   pix    Re     Half-light radius (1)
#  48- 51 F4.2   ---    z      Redshift
#  54- 54 D1     ---    B/R    Blue/Red SED (2)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#Note (1): 1 pixel = 0.03 arcsec.
#Note (2): Blue/Red SED types are based on the visual inspection of the
#          PEARS slitless grism data.
